posts.name: AprilGrimoire
posts.cooked: Hi. Last week my TA asked me if I typeset my homework using Word. (I used Typst.) Is there a template mimicking LaTeX’s article documentclass (e.g., maketitle, page number, etc)?
posts.raw: Hi. Last week my TA asked me if I typeset my homework using Word. (I used Typst.) Is there a template mimicking LaTeX's article documentclass (e.g., maketitle, page number, etc)?

posts.name: Vincent Martel
posts.cooked:
Would that be a good start?

Typst

Guide for LaTeX users – Typst Documentation

Are you a LaTeX user? This guide explains the differences and similarities between Typst and LaTeX so you can get started quickly.
posts.raw:
Would that be a good start? 

https://typst.app/docs/guides/guide-for-latex-users/

posts.name: AprilGrimoire
posts.cooked: Hi! Thanks for replying. You mean the elsearticle template? That looks completely different from the article documentclass.
posts.raw: Hi! Thanks for replying. You mean the elsearticle template? That looks completely different from the `article` documentclass.

posts.cooked: I suppose after searching for “article latex” in Search — Typst: Universe this should be it: rubber-article – Typst Universe.
posts.raw: I suppose after searching for "article latex" in https://typst.app/universe/search/?kind=templates&q=article%20latex this should be it: https://typst.app/universe/package/rubber-article.

posts.name: AprilGrimoire
posts.cooked: Thanks! I missed it in my search probably because it didn’t look like a LaTeX article in the minipicture.
posts.raw: Thanks! I missed it in my search probably because it didn't look like a LaTeX article in the minipicture.

posts.name: niko
posts.cooked: Hey @AprilGrimoire Author of rubber-article here. I have recently updated the template and was wondering if the thumbnail now meets your expectations more closely?
posts.raw: Hey @AprilGrimoire Author of [rubber-article](https://typst.app/universe/package/rubber-article) here. I have recently updated the template and was wondering if the thumbnail now meets your expectations more closely?

posts.name: AprilGrimoire
posts.cooked: Hello niko! Thank you very much for your great template! I think the thumbnail met my expectations pretty well at the first place. It’s just that the first time I searched for ‘latex’ in templates, this template was surrounded by a ton of other templates about latex (but not the default article documentclass) and the mini-pic didn’t caught enough of my attention.
posts.raw: Hello niko! Thank you very much for your great template! I think the thumbnail met my expectations pretty well at the first place. It's just that the first time I searched for 'latex' in templates, this template was surrounded by a ton of other templates about latex (but not the default article documentclass) and the mini-pic didn't caught enough of my attention.
